Title: SUIE - SharePoint User Interface Enhancements
Description: SharePoint User Interface Enhancements is a collection of controls, web parts, configuration utilities to improve the SharePoint Interface. Some elements include tabs, accordion, content rotor and web fonts.
HomeWiki:
SharePoint User Interface Enhancements is a collection of controls, web parts, configuration utilities to improve the SharePoint Interface.

For more information, screen shots, and videos, visit the project page on my blog.

Features

Tabber Web Part

Transforms a SharePoint Web Part Zone into a tabbed zone. Just drop the Tabber into a zone, configure the orientation and theme.

  • Create tabbed web part zones from the browser with no code required.

  • Uses the popular jquery and  jquery-ui libraries.

  • Comes with 23 themes (included with jquery-ui) and custom themes can be easily be created for your site.

  • Easy to configure properties panel to control tab orientation and theme.

Accordion Web Part

Transforms a SharePoint Web Part Zone into an accordion zone. Just drop the Accordion into a zone, configure a few settings and theme.

  • Create accordion web part zones from the browser with no code required.

  • Uses the popular jquery and  jquery-ui libraries.

  • Comes with 23 themes (included with jquery-ui) and custom themes can be easily be created for your site.

  • Easy to configure properties panel to control accordion events, height, theme, and other behaviors.
